events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as this is quite disappointing.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's request for money back due to an incorrect delivery.
An agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle this case to ensure prompt resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect order you received.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I've attached the photo of the wrong item that I received in the email.
We have reviewed the photo and order details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you confirmation once itâ€™s completed.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate you handling this so promptly. Looking forward to the refund.
The refund has been successfully processed to your original payment method. Please check your account and let us know if you have any further concerns.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory or if you require additional assistance.
As there has been no response after our follow-up, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience, and have a great day!
